function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workers with comorbidities are at a higher risk of COVID-19 infection and severe complications.","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness, hospitalization, and death for workers with comorbidities if not mitigated.","Mitigation":"Implement work-from-home policies for workers with comorbidities, and grant exemptions only to essential workers with proper risk assessment and medical recommendations.","Technologies":"Online questionnaire or application for self-health evaluation, partition/barriers, disinfection protocols.","People":"Workers with comorbidities, essential workers, supervisors, workers in shared vehicles.","Owner":"Company, supervisors, workers, health and safety team"},{"Description":"Failure to conduct a self-health evaluation and implement preventive measures for workers in shared vehicles increases the risk of COVID-19 transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among workers in shared vehicles, leading to potential outbreaks within the workforce.","Mitigation":"Implement self-health evaluation protocols, provide partitions/barriers, enforce mask-wearing, and disinfection after each use of the vehicle.","Technologies":"Online questionnaire or application for self-health evaluation, partitions/barriers, disinfection protocols.","People":"Workers in shared vehicles, supervisors, health and safety team.","Owner":"Company, supervisors, workers"},{"Description":"Lack of efficient contact tracing measures for workers in shared vehicles can lead to difficulties in identifying close contacts in case of a confirmed COVID-19 case.","Impact":"Challenges in tracing close contacts within the workforce, leading to potential widespread transmission in the workplace.","Mitigation":"Record passengers' name logs and seat numbers to facilitate contact tracing in case of a confirmed COVID-19 case within the workforce.","Technologies":"Passenger name logs, seat number recording.","People":"Workers in shared vehicles, supervisors, health and safety team.","Owner":"Company, supervisors, workers"}]}
